title: 44 - 44 "Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!"Transliteration: "Egao no Tabitachi! Saraba Kokyō Kokoyashi Mura" (Japanese:笑顔の旅立ち!さらば故郷ココヤシ村) Kōnosuke Uda Michiru Shimada 513.2 October 11, 2000(2000-10-11)[80] —
transformers_text: 44 44 Setting Out with a Smile Farewell Hometown Coco yash i Village Transliteration E gao no Tab itachi S araba Kok y Koko yash i Mura Japanese K no suke Uda Michiru Shimada 513 2 October 11 2000 2000 10 11 80 With Ar long's defeat by Luffy Ar long's reign of terror is over and no one has anything on their mind except to party the fall of Ar long As the crew celebrates Nami reflects on her hometown and decides to officially join the Straw Hat Pirates
